subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The two-time Masters champion Bernhard Langer moved into position for his second Champions Tour victory by shooting his second straight six-under 65 to take a three-stroke lead at the Toshiba Classic in Newport Beach, Calif.
snippet: The two-time Masters champion Bernhard Langer moved into position for his second Champions Tour victory by shooting his second straight six-under 65 to take a three-stroke lead at the Toshiba Classic in Newport Beach, Calif.
